mapper.insert: insert into focustable(id, goodstable_id, busertable_id,focustime) values (null, #{gid}, #{uid},now())
mapper.select: select * from focustable where goodstable_id=#{gid} and busertable_id=#{uid}
select * from carttable where goodstable_id=#{gid} and busertable_id=#{uid}
mapper.update: update carttable set shoppingnum=shoppingnum+#{shoppingnum} where busertable_id=#{uid} and goodstable_id=#{gid}
mapper.select: select gt.id, gt.gname, gt.gpicture, gt.grprice, ct.shoppingnum, ct.shoppingnum*gt.grprice smallsum from GOODSTABLE gt, CARTTABLE ct where gt.id=ct.goodstable_id and ct.busertable_id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from carttable where busertable_id=#{uid} and goodstable_id=#{gid}
